text: Northern Rhodesia was a territory in south central Africa. It was founded in 1911. It became independent in 1964 as Zambia. The term "Rhodesia" in geography meant a region which is now Zambia and Zimbabwe. From 1964 on, it only meant Southern Rhodesia. == Related pages == * Southern Rhodesia == References == Category:20th-century establishments in Zambia Category:1911 establishments Category:1964 disestablishments Category:Former British colonies Category:Former colonies in Africa
title: Northern Rhodesia
